alert.note: Alert for Madison; Northern Oneida; Onondaga; Southern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 13 at 3:43PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A LAKE EFFECT SNOW BAND WILL AFFECT PARTS OF ONONDAGA...SOUTHERN ONEIDA...MADISON...AND NORTHERN ONEIDA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A lake effect snow band accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 343 PM EST, a lake effect snow band was along a line extending from near Jordan to near Clayville. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Onondaga, Syracuse, Clay, Rome, Cicero, De Witt, Lysander, Sullivan, Van Buren, and Oneida. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 between 32 and 39. New York Interstate 81 between 15 and 31. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&

area.areaDesc: Madison; Northern Oneida; Onondaga; Southern Oneida
